actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 to provide that the chairman of the National Endowment for the Arts may make grants or contracts for the purpose of meeting the operating costs associated with projects and productions in the arts.

summary.text: Provides, under the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965, that the Chairman of the National Endowment for the Arts may make grants or contracts for the purpose of meeting the operating costs associated with projects and productions in the arts.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 to provide that the chairman of the National Endowment for the Arts may make grants or contracts for the purpose of meeting the operating costs associated with projects and productions in the arts.
